Package weka.attributeSelection

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinaryTournamentSelection
    Class to perform a binary tournament selection in a population of individuals.
    BitFlipMutation
    This class performs the bit-flip mutation in a population of individuals.
    Crossover
    This class represents a crossover operator.
    CrossoverFactory
    This class allows you to create different crossover operators.
    EvolutionarySearch
    EvolutionarySearch explores the attribute space using an Evolutionary Algorithm (EA).
    EvolutionaryStatistics
    This class gathers statistics for the Evolutionary Algorithm.
    GenerationalReplacement
    This class performs a generational replacement.
    Individual
    This class is used to represent an individual in the context of Evolutionary Algorithms (EAs).
    IndividualComparator
    This class is used to sort the population.
    Initialization
    This class represents an initialization operator.
    InitializationFactory
    This class allows you to create different initialization operators.
    Mutation
    This class represents a mutation operator.
    MutationFactory
    This class allows you to create different mutation operators.
    Operator
    Class representing a general operator.
    Population
    This class is used to model the concept of population in Evolutionary Algorithms (EAs).
    RandomInitialization
    This class creates a population of randomly initialized individuals.
    RandomSelection
    This class performs a random selection in a population of individuals.
    Replacement
    This class represents a replacement operator.
    ReplacementFactory
    This class allows you to create different replacement operators.
    Selection
    This class represents a selection operator.
    SelectionFactory
    This class allows you to create different selection operators.
    SinglePointCrossover
    This class performs the single-point crossover in a population of individuals.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EvolutionaryException
    This class is used to throw exceptions related to EvolutionarySearch
